Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Arrhythmia/Heart Block/Atrioventricular Block
Pathological Conditions, Signs and Symptoms/Pathologic Processes/Arrhythmias, Cardiac/Heart Block/Atrioventricular Block
Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Arrhythmias, Cardiac/Heart Block/Atrioventricular Block
Record.Description: Impaired impulse conduction from HEART ATRIA to HEART VENTRICLES. AV block can mean delayed or completely blocked impulse conduction.
A delay or failure in the conduction of a cardiac impulse from the atria to the ventricles at the level of the atrioventricular node.
